document_data.name: ''[[The World Beneath Waterdeep]]''
document_data.author: [[Wently Kelso]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''The World Beneath Waterdeep''''' was a compiled collection of journals and notes by the scholar [[Wently Kelso]].
document_data.Description: This book detailed the expedition of Wently Kelso and his team beneath [[Waterdeep]], from the sewers to the inner sanctum of the [[beholder]] crime-lord [[Xanathar]]. After returning, Kelso compiled his journals into book form, which was used to help confirm the existence of the evil doings of Xanathar.
